song.title: Conjugal Visit
song.lyrics:
Baby, mi miss yuh so much
Mi waan fi sneak inna yuh cell and gi yuh a *******
Yuh a mi baby
Gyal come yah, mek mi love yuh up

Yuh tight body gyal yuh got mi
Dis hood long like a thousand story
Mi a beg yuh please show mi yuh glory
Mi waan yuh fi love mi like yuh own mi
Mi love yuh, yuh know mi love yuh right?
Mi love yuh, come love mi like yuh own mi
Mi love yuh, yuh know mi love yuh right?
Mi love yuh, come love mi

Betta seh yuh real, get ready or shut up
Come push it deep inna mi stomach
Gyal yuh do it pon yuh knee, di back turn up
Mek sure yuh nuh weak 'cause mi love it hot
Every pillow catch a fire, all di mattress burn up
Try nuh fi come quick like mi call Apollo
Dat nuh how mi do it, di love haffi flow
Mi a grind to di beat, tip toe pon yuh toe

We nuh sideshow
Nuttin' nuh go work, so let's go
Pose like yuh a play domino
Oh baby, mi a move slow
And a wait fi di long ting fi go below
Yo, mi nuh come fast if yuh never know
Yuh a di bad bwoy Trevor though
'Cause mi always high, so mi never low
Mi baby

Yuh tight body gyal yuh got mi
Dis hood long like a thousand story
Mi a beg yuh please show mi yuh glory
Mi waan yuh fi love mi like yuh own mi
Mi love yuh, yuh know mi love yuh right?
Mi love yuh, come love mi like yuh own mi
Mi love yuh, yuh know mi love yuh right?
Mi love yuh, come love mi

Mi seh yuh neat, yuh nice, yuh body got di spice
Yeah, yuh a di one mek mi rejoice
Ring it inna yuh hole, mobile device
Stab it out if yuh want, chop it up like ice
If yuh leave mi, mi a go madder than Rodney Price
But mi nah go nowhere, mi lock in fi life
If yuh think mi a cut, mi a pull out di knife

In real life, we nuh sideshow
Nuttin' nuh go work, so let's go
Pose like yuh a play domino
Oh baby, mi a move slow
And a wait fi di long ting fi go below
Yo, mi nuh come fast if yuh never know
Yuh a di bad bwoy Trevor though
'Cause mi always high, so mi never low
Mi baby

Yuh tight body gyal yuh got mi
Dis hood long like a thousand story
Mi a beg yuh please show mi yuh glory
Mi waan yuh, come love mi like yuh own mi
Mi love yuh, yuh know mi love yuh right?
Mi love yuh, come love mi like yuh own mi
Mi love yuh, yuh know mi love yuh right?
Mi love yuh, come love mi like yuh own mi

Mi love yuh, yuh know mi love yuh right?
Mi love yuh, come love mi like yuh own mi
Mi love yuh, yuh know mi love yuh right?
Mi love yuh, come love mi like yuh own mi
Come love mi like yuh own mi
Come love mi like yuh own mi
